title: Troller - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Seinen
tags: Adventurers   Anti-social Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Body Tempering   Character Growth   Dungeons   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hunters   Level System   Lucky Protagonist   Magic   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Overpowered Protagonist   Pragmatic Protagonist   Skill Assimilation   Summoning Magic   Survival   Unique Weapon User   Weak to Strong

description:
A man who lost his consciousness and opened his eyes in an unknown place on his way home from his part-time job begins a game of survival...

“Yes, please. This damn game.”

Dungeons, survival, hunters, in a new modern fantasy.

The story of a man soaked in blood.>
